alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Clayton; Fayette; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 1:44AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeast Iowa through 230 AM CDT... At 143 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Waucoma to Fairbank. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fort Atkinson around 150 AM CDT. Calmar and Maynard around 155 AM CDT. Fayette and Ossian around 200 AM CDT. Arlington around 205 AM CDT. Postville and Volga around 210 AM CDT. Elkader around 220 AM CDT. Farmersburg around 225 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Volney, Mederville, Festina, Randalia, Giard, Highways 3 And 187, Watson, County Road W 46 And Centennial Road, Bixby State Park and County Roads X 16 And W 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
